sentences.sentence: However, exhaustions from the engine contain many harmful components which will harm the health of underground working staff.
sentences.translation: 但其发动机所排出的废气含有多种有害成分，会影响井下工人的健康。

sentences.sentence: This paper discusses the compositions of the exhaustions and the hazards concerned, and presents the purification methods of these gases.
sentences.translation: 文章介绍了柴油铲运机所排废气的成分及其危害，阐述了此类废气的净化方法。
